We are one of the largest online-only retailers is seeking to add a talented Junior Content Writer to help us with our in-house marketingrnrnYou should be enthusiastic about writing natural, engaging copy, with a good eye for what reads well in high-quality, informative content. You will be highly motivated with an interest in digital and traditional marketing, and will be responsible for helping to create fresh, engaging content for press releases, product information, social media, blog posts and other strategic material to support the wider marketing team s efforts.rnrnYou will work directly with an SEO executive on creating and optimising digital content to ensure relevant, high quality content is available across digital platforms.rnrnKey SkillsrnrnDegree level writing expertise (required)rnrnUnderstanding of SEO and wider digital marketing (preferred)rnrnE-commerce experience (preferred)rnWe will release money on each article we receiveWe will release money on each article we receiveWe will release money on each article we receive

Requirements:rnrn1) store data scraped into either dynamodbrnrn2) listen to notifications to fire news scrapernrn3) being able to run cronjobsrnrn4)being able to unify all time to one timezonernrn5) being able to use a proxy to prevent ip blocking ( will purchase and provide)rnrn6) 3 lambdas: *one for news,rnrn*one for stats,table,fixtures,googlesheetrnrn*another for team fixturesrnrn rnrn rnrn*The required are 8 apis end points,rnrn*6 simple html page scripts from scratch and one to be duplicated with different urlrnrn*one rss feed listener, and one to be duplicated with different urlrnrn*two apis response scraping scriptsrnrnthe project is divided into these steps:rnrn rnrn rnrn* news:rnrn1)scripts: there are 5 rss feeds created, there is one should be created, and another one duplicated with different url. All these rss feeds should run in one lambda every 5 minutes and if there are news urls open the html content and scrape it.rnrn2) 4 simple html pages scraping to run if there were new news posted in the rss feedsrnrn3) db table is already done only missing isLocal coloumnrnrn4) 2 apis, one with pagingrnrn rnrn*Standing:script,db is created ( should run every 10 minutes from 1 pm to 12 am)rnrn1)1 api to creaternrn2) add a column to detect if the team position increased(1) or decreased(-1) ,or remained the same(0) from te previous scrape insertrnrn rnrn*Fixtures: scraping api is done, db is donernrnneed to create one api end pointsrnrnStats html page, googlesheet scrape and team fixtures will be done from scratchrnrncheck pdf file for more detailsrnrn rnrnstart job offer with RD07rnrnpreferably to use python for scraping as most scripts are done with pythonrn

We run an online meal delivery business that is seeking someone to fill an SEO role, we are looking for someone with a proven history of helping rank for competitive keywords. You will be responsible for growing our acquisitions through Organic searches and you will be measured on improvements to impression/click counts for relevant keywords in our organic traffic. Please provide as much of the following otherwise please do not expect your application to be considered as I would not have enough information to consider your application seriously: -What keywords have you worked on and what rankings have you provided for the companies? (Please only include keywords that are competitive and have a minimum of 5k searches per month). The more provided the better your application will be. -Please provide references, testimonials and case studies for the companies above. Once we decide to work together please note I will be contacting them to verify your involvement with them. Qualities needed to be successful: -Ability to drive Organic traffic to website/SEO. -Understanding official google guidelines/white/black hat strategies -Online marketing experience/E-commerce experience. Thank you and I look forward to hearing from you.

Raintree House Holidays are a holiday letting business in North Cornwall, near Padstow, England, UK. We currently run a piece of commercial letting software, called CFP Holidaylets, running on MS Access 97. We have written a bespoke Access 2003 Application, CFP Extra, that uses 5-10 Linked tables from the CFP HolidayLets Application, along with tens of other tables, queries, forms, VBA modules. We are migrating to new letting software in mid Feb. Its an application called Tabs2, [login to view URL] CFP Holidaylets will be end-of-lifed; CFP Extra will continue. Tabs2 has an API that we are trying to use to populate a MySQL Db, the tables of which can then be linked into CFP Extra, the Access 2003 Application. Our web developers have spent some time on this but we don t have it completed and are looking for help. Our web developers have written scripts to extract the data required from the API, and have tried to populate both a MySQL table sat on the web server, and also a MariaDb MySQL Db on a Synology server within our network. They have had more success populating the Db on the web server, but I can t get consistent success from linking these tables into CFP Extra, the Access Db. They have struggled to run the script successfully to populate the MariaDb Db on the Synology server within my network. The script is written in PHP 7 to pull data out of the API and push the data into a database. It is designed to be run from the command line. It contains a readme with details of how to install and run the code, and a sample db construction as an SQL script for MySQL/MariaDB. Details for the database connection are held in a separate settings file, as described in the readme. This package is available in due course. The script may need to be edited over time to improve its running or to change the data it extracts, but the main work is to agree where best to site the MySQL Db (on Synology in network, or on web server) and then achieve a consistent connection to this, via linked tables, from an Access 2003 Db. Migrating CFP Extra, the Access 2003 app, to a more modern version of MS Access is feasible if this would improve performance/reliability (and this is envisaged over time), but ideally this would not be done now. Please get in touch if you think you have the PHP, MySQL, MS Access and network skills to get this running for us. We are hoping to get this running by the last week of January latest so we have 3-4 weeks testing prior to Go Live.
There are scanned PDF files about client emails and relative information. Please copy paste into excel sheet. I need to finish it within 3 days.

The site should comprise the basics: home/ who am I/ How I work/ price list/ recipes/ link to Instagram. I can show you pages and styles I like. I also need dat the webdesigner teaches me how to add pages to the site, and how to update the site in the future. Graphic Design, HTML, PHP, Website Design, WordPress

I need a Professional Creative Video Presentation Producer and Experts for the following: - To modify my logo stings templates and video openers I will provide. - I will need your expert skill with the video transition effects between each slide - Add sound and sound effects in between transitions. - Merging section footage and add display text overlay explaining each slide. This is a corporate and industry video and I need to have a professional and creative look and feel to it. What I will provide: - I will provide the video templates. - I will provide the footage for each section. - I will provide the text script for each slide. What you will provide: - Your expertise and creativity. - Transitional effects in between each slide. - Music and sound effects for each slide over the duration of the video. - Explainer voiceovers to read over the script for each section or you point me to where I can get the voiceovers done and you add the voice to each section of the video. A full video production. Video Duration: 180 seconds. Video Format: I will need a very compressed file and in a format I can load on a site (specifically WordPress); and also embed on a Slider Revolution. After Effects, Animation, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Services

I have numerous social media pages (FB, Insta, etc.) and instead of promoting them directly, I want to have a blog site built, that I can then share links to from my social media pages. The site will need to be secure and SEO optimized. No Flash please - only HTML5 Graphic Design, HTML5, PHP, Website Design, WordPress

KickBack is a Norwegian e-commerce marketing company that operates several highly popular coupon and discount sites in Norway, Sweden, Denmark and Poland. We re soon launching a new site in Austria and we need your help! You ll help us keeping the site up to date with the latest offers and coupon codes. You ll be working with an English speaking manager. We prefer to communicate via Slack. *What is the job that needs to be done?* - Update site daily with new coupons, offers and content - Monitor performance of merchants - Write a 100% unique content - Have SEO in mind when writing - i.e make sure certain keywords are used *What are we looking for in a freelancer?* - You ll need to be a native German/Austrian writer/speaker - You ll need to write fluently german and have a good understanding of English - You have basic understanding of SEO and take no shortcuts - You are a quick learner and independent - Quick turnaround - Trustworthy

I need working Paypal payment for my site. - desired solution = payment-button accept payments, webhook accept payment notifications and validates them - I have to send ORDER_ID - Here is the button starting payment - https://psihoprofili.com/PPtst-2.php - it alerts message PAYMENT SUCCESSFUL and redirect the user to login page - webhook reads Paypal answer and autorises the order ORDER_ID in mySQL DB - if this scheme is not acceptable for my case - offer me a solution ( submit a web form) details: - All files have to be created from developer (you) in php . - payment = paypal account and cards -- card payment --- attached cards to paypal account AND Guest billings (without attached card) --- to ask for minimum input data ( only cards data without customers data is perfect) - I am selling membership - no shipping address or downloads are needed - types of payments to be accepted: one time, recurring - webhook are for payments made (one time, recurring) and rized disputes

I want to assign a few zones to one country in prestashop 1.7. Currently, Prestashop1.7 only allow one country, one zone. In the backend of prestashop, it is only allowed to set one country consist one zone only. However, I want to assign 3 different zones for one country. For example, Country A consist 3 zones (zone 1, zone 2, zone 3). This is for shipping purposes. Because all 3 zones apply different charges for shipping. For example, currently at the backend, I assign zone A to the country. At product check out page, I insert address with zone B postcode, the shipping cost maintain with zone A shipping charge. While zone B is set with different shipping charge than A. I need to assign 3 zones assign for one country so that the shipping charges at check out page is correct. This is a small project, the budget is $10-$15.

All you need to do is fill our online form, scan and upload your documents and we ll take care of the rest.

We use the standard Module Dasboards from odoo. We use it to Display pie charts from the pos report view/ pivot view. In Pos Pivot we had created a filter for today. Problem now is when we push the pie chart with filter today to the dashboard. It would work for today. (this means the set day) Wenn we look in the dashboard tomorrow(next day) it show data from yesterday. So this means the Dasboard is not refreshing it by his own. So for autorefresh we need a solution. Actuall code we use for filter today is - filter string= Today name= today domain= [( order_date , = , [login to view URL]( %Y-%m-%d )),( order_date , = ,[login to view URL]( %Y-%m-%d ))] help= POS ordered created today / separator/ Skills: Java, Odoo, Python, XML See more: joomla shout box spam
